title: Which is correct, 'an essay' or 'a essay'? - Quora

response.answer_text: The correct answer is “an essay”. The reason for using the article “an” is that the word starts with a vowel (a,e,i,o,u) so in such cases “an” is used in front of the word. We use “a” when the first letter is not a vowel and the pronunciation of the word does not begin with a vowel.
